name: Creamsicle® Cheesecake
author: EatEverything
summary: This fabulous cheesecake will remind you of Mayfield® creamsicle ice cream with every bite you take! I love it!
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Beat cream cheese and sugar together in a large bowl with an electric mixer until light and fluffy; add eggs and beat well
Beat sour cream and vanilla extract into cream cheese mixture until batter is smooth
Transfer one cup of the cream cheese mixture to a small bowl and stir in orange extract, yellow food coloring, and red food coloring until batter is smooth and orange
Pour uncolored batter into prepared graham cracker crust
Drop spoonfuls of orange batter over the top of the uncolored batter and run a knife through the orange batter to create a marbled effect
Bake in the preheated oven until the edges are firm and center is slightly loose, 30 to 35 minutes
Cool at room temperature for 1 hour
Cover cheesecake with plastic wrap and chill in the refrigerator, 8 hours to overnight
